page.title: 07The Writers of Ampleforth
page.content:
{ Mr.Walker}writes about the police in his 'Constable' series and local topics. He also writes a lot of articles for newspapers. Seven of his books have been translated into Spanish, Italian, Icelandic and German. His publisher, Robert Hale of London, will only accept two books a year under his real name, so he writes under some pseudonyms.
{ Mr.Spence}lives in the Ampleforth College post office. He has written 32 westerns, war stories, guide books in collaboration with his wife. He likes doing something he enjoys as a career. He writes on a word-processor which makes editing more efficient. He normally knows the outline of a fictional book before he starts and then the characters in the story virtually take control.
